sourcesContent:
<script>
export default {
  name: "ToolBar",
  data () {
    return {
      dialog: false,
      items: [
        {
          icon: 'home',
          text: 'Home',
        },
        {
          icon: 'info',
          text: 'About',
        },
        {
          icon: 'assignment_turned_in',
          text: 'Menu',
        },
        {
          icon: 'email',
          text: 'Ordina',
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
</script>


<template>
  <v-card
      flat
      height="48px"
      tile
    >
      <v-toolbar
        dense
        color="primary"
        class="golden-color"
      >
        <v-img
          src="../assets/logo_taurus_transparent.png"
          max-height="40px"
          max-width="40px"
        ></v-img>
        <v-toolbar-title class="pl-2">Pizzeria Taurus</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-toolbar-items class="pt-1">
          <v-btn
            v-for="item in items"
            v-bind:key="item.text"
            class="golden-color"
            text
            small
          >
            {{ item.text }}
          </v-btn>

        </v-toolbar-items>

      </v-toolbar>
    </v-card>
</template>


<style scoped>

.golden-color {
  color: #DDB752 !important;
}

</style>
